# St Theodore's Institute

> Classical Christian Education in the Liberal Arts Tradition



Kitsaplabs.com is an LOB (Line of Business) of Prompt Neurons, LLC, providing webhost reseller services internally to other business units.

## Websites Managed

- [St Theodore's Institute](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com): St. Theodore's Insitute training site
- [Owncloud File Sharing](https://purl.org/sanddollar/share): Redirects to STI and is used for hosting files here

## Docs
- [About](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/Encyclopedia.md)


## Subject Pages at Whitespace Blog

This is mostly future indexing.  The system is described at:

- [Macrobius Expansive Catelogue](https://purl.org/whitespace/2025/10/05/macrobius-expansive-catalogue/)

Classification scheme described in 

[Cutter Expansive Classification – Whitespace](http://45.79.58.143:8080/2025/10/05/cutter-expansive-classification/)

Named entities are in Class E (Biography) if natural persons, and in Class K (for Organizations or Societies) if corporations or other organizations

Places are under Class G (Geography)

### A - Works of Reference and General
- [A – Works of Reference and General – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/a-works-of-reference-and-general/)  Human Readable

### B - Philosophy and Paideia
- [B – Philosophy and Paideia – Whitespace](https://url.org/whitespace/b-philosophy-and-paideia/)  Human Readable

### C - Christianity
- [C – Christianity – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/c-christianity/) 

### D - Ecclesiastical History
- [D – Ecclesiastical History – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/d-ecclesiastical-history/)  

### E - Biography
- [E – Biography – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/e-biography/)  

### F - History
- [F – History – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/f-history/)  

### G - Geography
- [G – Geography – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/g-geography/)

- [H – Demotics, Sociology – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/h-demotics-sociology/)
